name: CORE
tag_list: plm, global-sourcing, supplier-collaboration, product-lifecycle-management, edi, supply-chain-finance, supply-chain-management, critical-path-management
overview:
Core Solutions (CORE) is a leading provider of retail product lifecycle management, global sourcing and supplier collaboration solutions which help global retailers and manufacturers streamline and scale their operations.

Products and services offered by CORE include both enterprise and on-demand web-based applications delivered through a software-as-a-service model. CORE is one of a handful of companies operating in this niche software space.

With product lifecycle management software growing at a rate of around 30% per year, as retailers look for ways to grow their top and bottom line performance, CORE is well positioned for high growth in the coming years.
